babushka.description: Lucie's mom is visiting for a few weeks.  Her Felix-name is Babushka, which Felix pronounces "Booshka!"
babushka.title: Babushka

dario.description: Many upperclassmen at Felix's school graduated this week.  Lucie, Babushka and Milo attended the ceremony.  Here is Dario, a particular friend of Felix.  He's Cuban!
dario.title: Dario

evan1.description:
Felix has been missing Evan, so we kept him all day and night Saturday. Excursions were taken in the new double stroller, which is a present from Mimaw (Nana's mom). Thanks!

Felix has quickly staked out the back seat as his personal dominion.
evan1.title: Evan 1

evan4.description: Felix and Evan play sweetly together... and then at other times they act like brothers, and  fight about who's operating the crane.
evan4.title: Evan 4

evan5.description: Whereas Felix is as law-and-order as any kid we've ever seen, Evan is more of a free thinker on his interpretation of house rules.  Here he attempts to "fix" a bus, which is much safer than his previous activity of trying to "fix" our camera.  It reminds us that when Milo starts crawling we might actually have to childproof our house, something we never really had to do with Felix.
evan5.title: Evan 5

evan6.description: Felix recounts this book from memory.  "See Evan, cow in a balloon!"
evan6.title: Evan 6

evan7.description: Thomas the Train may be a part of one of the most soulessly efficient corporations targeting today's kids, but Felix still thinks their books are the height of literature.
evan7.title: Evan 7

nap1.description: Do not underestimate how hard it is to simultaneously induce sleep in both a newborn and a toddler
nap1.title: Nap 1

yogamoms1.description: The women from Lucie's pregnant-women-yoga-class formed a mom's group.  At this, the first meeting, about half of the buns had come out of the oven.  This is Elliot (August 11) and Milo.
yogamoms1.title: Yogamoms 1

yogamoms2.description: Rosy (due Oct 4) and big sister-to-be Eva try out Milo.
yogamoms2.title: Yogamoms 2

description:
Milo's becoming more aware. After eating there's a period where he's alert, not fussy, and wants to look into your eyes.

Felix is attempting ever-longer sentences but gets tripped up trying to hook up 10 to 15 words together. Words bang and crash together, and sometimes the sentence spins wildly out of control and explodes in flames. We have yet to catch this on film.
title: August 22
